name: Penne Pasta with Spinach and Bacon
author: Jean Tagliere
summary: This is a quick light meal. Wilted spinach, bacon and tomatoes are tossed with penne pasta. Good for any season and will complement anything.
ingredients: 1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add the penne pasta, and cook until tender, 8 to 10 minutes
Meanwhile, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Place bacon in the skillet, and cook until browned and crisp
Add garlic, and cook for about 1 minute
Stir in the tomatoes, and cook until heated through
Place the spinach into a colander, and drain the hot pasta over it so it is wilted
Transfer to a large serving bowl, and toss with the remaining olive oil, and the bacon and tomato mixture
